name: Flower Challenge
description:
Flower Challenge is a flower hunter simulator. Here you can walk around the forest and enjoy nature, meet different animals and, of course, gather flowers.

The goal of the game is not only to gather as many flowers as possible but also to find the way back to the car without any modern equipment. Only the best flower hunters are able to cope with this.

Main Game Features:
- look for flowers,
- pick as many flowers as you can,
- enjoy nature,
- walk as long as you want,
- watch forest animals,
- find the way back.
